mapper.sql: bppd.plate_parts_det_id, bppd.plate_parts_id, bppd.parts_information_id, bppd.route_id, bppd.specification, bppd.unit, bppd.quantity, bppd.color, bppd.material_quality, bppd.organization_id, bppd.remark, bppd.`status`, bppd.create_user_id, bppd.create_time, bppd.modified_user_id, bppd.modified_time, bppd.is_delete
mapper.select: select ,bpi.parts_information_code,bpi.parts_information_name,sr.route_name from fantech_imes.base_plate_parts_det bppd LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user su ON bppd.create_user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user sus ON bppd.modified_user_id = sus.user_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.base_organization bo ON bppd.organization_id = bo.organization_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.base_parts_information bpi ON bpi.parts_information_id = bppd.parts_information_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_route sr ON sr.route_id = bppd.route_id where bppd.plate_parts_id = #{platePartsId}
